text: Surunga Municipality (Nepali: सुरुङ्‍गा नगरपालिका) is located in Saptari District in the Province 2 of Nepal. It was formed in 2016 occupying current 11 sections (wards) merging previous Pipra, Hardiya, Daulatpur, Madhupati, Kushaha, Haripur, Malhanwa, Tikulya,Pramanpur(ward no.09) and Patewarba VDCs. It occupies an area of 107.04 km2 with a total population of 44,221. == References == Category:Populated places in Saptari District Category:Nepal municipalities established in 2016
title: Surunga Municipality
